mapper.select: select a.id, a.routine_day, a.routine_date, a.routine_start_time, a.routine_trans_oraganization_id, a.routine_id, b.routine_title from notices_routine_trans_oraganization_detail a join notices_routine b on a.routine_id = b.id where a.routine_trans_oraganization_id = #{routine_trans_oraganization_id} order by id
mapper.insert: insert into notices_routine_trans_oraganization_detail ( created, modified, routine_day, routine_date, routine_start_time, routine_trans_oraganization_id, routine_id ) values ( now(), now(), #{routine_day}, #{routine_date}, #{routine_start_time}, #{routine_trans_oraganization_id}, #{routine_id} )
